section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Unit" means an officer or other entity of a political subdivision.
"Unit" includes a board of license commissioners.
"Civil penalty" means a civil fine or other monetary penalty administratively imposed.

"Political subdivision" means:
A county;
A municipal corporation; or
A bicounty agency.

text.section:
Unless otherwise provided by statute, ordinance, or regulation, a unit authorized by law to impose a civil penalty up to a specific dollar amount for violation of any statute, ordinance, or regulation shall consider the following in setting the amount of the penalty:
The severity of the violation for which the penalty is to be assessed;
The good faith of the violator; and
Any history of prior violations.
